id: get-crypto-report-by-currency-and-format-rest-controller-execute
title: "Get user's portfolio statement."
description: "Get the user's portfolio statement by currency symbol, format (PDF or XLSX), and date range. If no date range is provided, the default 1-year range will be considered. Insert the statement details in the parameters below and execute the request to obtain the file's ID. Enter the generated file ID in the 'storage/:id/download' endpoint to download the statement. The portfolio statement allows users to view and download a historical record of their wallet activity. It can also serve as a helpful tool to evaluate their trading performance."

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get user's portfolio statement.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/otc/portfolio-statements"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get the user's portfolio statement by currency symbol, format (PDF or XLSX), and date range. If no date range is provided, the default 1-year range will be considered. Insert the statement details in the parameters below and execute the request to obtain the file's ID. Enter the generated file ID in the 'storage/:id/download' endpoint to download the statement. The portfolio statement allows users to view and download a historical record of their wallet activity. It can also serve as a helpful tool to evaluate their trading performance.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"format","required":true,"in":"query","description":"Portfolio statement format.","schema":{"enum":["pdf","xlsx"],"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"currency_symbol","required":true,"in":"query","description":"Portfolio statement currency symbol","example":"BTC","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"created_at_start","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Portfolio statement created at start.","schema":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"created_at_end","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Portfolio statement created at end.","schema":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Header Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"nonce","in":"header","description":"The nonce ID is a UUID (v4) used to uniquely identify the requisition. All requisitions must have an identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>
